column1:
TooMuchLEGO,"2011-02-24T18:58:39.633Z","The reason I am a LEGO fan.","This was my very first LEGO set. Ever. I can remember being a little kid and building houses, cars, bases....

and this set has a pretty good building experience. I mean, it's a brick bucket. No instructions, no limits, nothing. You could build a car repair shop. Or a house. A car. A base. Anything. And you get this little minifigure (who sits on my desk right now) with black shades and a green jacket.

Because of the limitless possibilities for building, there's also unlimited playability! Has the car broken down? Is there a hurricane? Are the bad guys bombing you? Whatever! The set has so much play it's ridiculous!
column2:
Not to mention this set does have some neat pieces too, such as a blue slope with stars (useful for building racecars) and transparent pieces.

Now my final word is that this set just rocks. It was my gateway into LEGO and I love it so much. Bless you set 4810. Bless you.
",TRUE,5,5,5,5,5

column1:
legodude357,"2011-02-25T09:03:14.66Z","My first Lego set.","

Like another reviewer on here, this was my first set. I remember when I was very young, 2 or 3, my dad gave me this and I rememeber buying countless Lego starwars sets like Jedi defense one and what not to fill it with. I built capital ships and such for my Obiwan and Qui-gon figures. I kinda wish I still had this set today. This started my Lego career and I've never quit.

A minifigure, bricks, and a few specialtly peices. All for a great price. What more could ya want? I wouldn't go out of my way to buy one of these, but let me tell you. It is a great set to store your lego sets and such in. Highly reccomended for someone you want to get started in lego. Just remeber to buy more sets for it!
I used him as a hostage taken by the droids
column2: a lot. He's pretty basic but plays a huge role in this set. Without minifigures, lego creations and houses wouldn't be playable. Mocs would be extremely bland. And this little dude teaches that to the new Lego fan.

column1: I, again, highly reccomend this for someone new to lego, or someone who you want to get interested in Legos. Its still pretty cheap, I just saw one on ebay for $19.99. I had hours upon hours of enjoyment from it. But (yes again) remember to keep buying more sets to put in it. I would reccomend this to a friend! Thanks for reading!
